attributes.action: Stop Veterinary Practices charging extortionate fees
attributes.additional_details:
The reason so many animals suffer and are abandoned is down to the heavy vet fees that people feel that they cannot take their pets to the vets.
Everyone is entitled to own an animal and it’s unfair on the animals that the simplest of treatments costs £££’s.
The pet insurance companies are also unfair and injust that they don’t pay and find loopholes not to pay. 
We could really make a change to many animals lives if there was regulations in place
attributes.background: I would like vets to be governed so they can’t charge astronomical fees.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for setting vet fees. This is a matter for individual veterinary practices.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Create a “PHS (Pet Health Service)” Scheme paid for by pet owners: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564754

Creating a new Animal Health Service (AHS) for free medical treatment in the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/332097
